features: Heat Mastery System: T fal's heat mastery system is a 3 ingredient recipe for perfectly delicious cooking results every time, Superior and longer lasting non stick coating, an anti warping, even heat base and patented thermo spot technology

Thermo Spot Indicator: The ring around the spot turns solid red to show when pans are perfectly preheated and ready for ingredients to be added proper preheating is key to sealing in flavor and cooking food evenly
Durable Nonstick: Superior proglide toxin free nonstick interior and exterior stands upto rigorous everyday cooking, Allows for cooking without frustrating stuck on messes
Riveted Handles and Even Heat Bases: Stay cool handles are comfortable and secure, even heat bases ensure superior heat distribution for perfect results every meal
Use and Care: Suitable for all stove tops (except induction). Oven safe up to 350 degree Fahrenheit, Dishwasher safe, PFOA, lead, and cadmium free, Lifetime limited warranty
body.description: Experience T fal's Heat Mastery System, a three ingredient recipe for perfectly delicious cooking results every time…superior and longer lasting non stick coating, an anti warping, even heat base and patented Thermo Spot technology. From Grandma’s tried and true recipes to new ideas from a favorite cooking show, enjoy more Instagram worthy moments with T fal Specialty nonstick cookware. This T fal 5 Qt. Jumbo Cooker is deep and 12 inches wide, with enough cooking space for 4 to 5 chicken breasts. The user friendly cookware features durable aluminum construction that heats quickly and evenly for thorough all over heat. It also provides a step above the rest ProGlide toxin free nonstick surface (inside and out) that stands up to rigorous everyday use to consistently prevent food from sticking. Experience both delicious slide from the pan successful results and simple cleanup—no more tedious scrubbing (or scowling) at the sink needed with T fal Specialty nonstick cookware. For added convenience, T fal makes the important step of pre heating practically foolproof. The Thermo Spot heat indicator features a ring around the center that turns solid red to indicate when pans are properly pre heated, which is key for sealing in natural juices and flavor and cooking food evenly. Oven safe and dishwasher safe, T fal Specialty nonstick cookware offers a versatile assortment of pots and pans—perfect for anything from browning and frying to searing, sautéing, steaming, slow cooking and more. Heat source: GAS - ELECTRIC - CERAMIC - HALOGEN.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features and Benefits Durable Nonstick Interior Superior ProGlide non-stick interior and exterior for everyday cooking; heat resistant handles and tempered glass lids Thermo-Spot Technology T-fal exclusive indicator shows when the pan is perfectly preheated and ready to begin cooking Dishwasher Safe For easy clean up Comfortable Handles Ergonomic handles, secure and oven safe up to 350°F

About T-fal For more than 60 years, T-fal has aspired to make the lives of busy home cooks easier by providing ingenious, high-performing and user-friendly cookware that enables a shortcut to desired results, every time. It all started with a simple idea: a non-stick pan that would revolutionize food preparation, transfer and clean up -- allowing you to spend more time enjoying little moments with those you love. Today, as the industry leader in non-stick cookware, T-fal continuously strives to develop innovative product solutions that remove the guesswork and stress in the kitchen – such as T-fal Thermo-Spot - the unique heat indicator technology that shows when the pan is perfectly preheated and ready to begin cooking. T-fal is part of the Groupe SEB global family of brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it says it does.
reviews.reviewText: I'm not a chef. I cook a couple times a week and you'll never catch me spending hundreds of dollars on cookware, ever. I use plastic or wood utensils with it. It's huge, can cook 4 to 5 chicken breasts or a whole family sized meal. The nonstick is great, the lid feels heavy and durable, I say it's a reasonable price for an item that is large and deep enough to serve not only as a frying pan but a sauce pan and other similar purposes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love everything about this pan!
reviews.reviewText: It's non stick. Love. It's got deep sides. Love. It's got a lid. Love. It's price tag is decent. Love. This is the best skillet to make almost everything I cook. Breakfast burritos, potstickers, yakisoba, hashbrowns, chicken - this is an almost everyday pan in my house. We just love it. And it cleans up so quickly. Didn't think I would love a T-Fal - but I love it moreso than my expensive cookware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good pan. Nonstick. Durable. Good size.
reviews.reviewText: I like how it remains nonstick after so long (as long you use it corrrctly). Good size. Comes with a lid so def. a plus. I like how everything just glides. I cook anything in it and it all turns out great!!! Good price for the product. Get it. You won't regret it. I just ordered another one because 2 is always better than 1.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Recently my wife expressed her desire to replace the old worn out pan we use most in the kitchen. It was tired and had lost most of the scratch resistant coating due to its age. Amazon and T-fal to the rescue. This was the only place I could find an exact replacement for a decent price. We love this pan, it really does what it says and cooks evenly while not allowing anything to stick. It is super easy to clean thanks to the coating, and we currently only hand-wash to hopefully prolong its life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cooks perfectly and cleans up easily.
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice pan for the price.It heats evenly and is easy to clean.I could probably get a better one if I spent considerably more on it, but this one does everything I need it to do and looks good too.I thought I would want a larger one,but couldn't find one that was reasonably priced and was close to matching the rest of my pans.This size is fine though. Big enough for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought to replace similar Costco T-fal pan
reviews.reviewText: Bought a similar sized pan from Costco years ago. It needed to be replaced. This style is lighter weight and same size. Works really great. Just keep in mind, these pans only last a couple years with regular use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great pan! Huge, nonstick, good price. Wipes clean easily. A handle on both sides is a huge plus because this thing is big.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kitchen must have
reviews.reviewText: This is a very versatile skilled and is a must have for a family. Clean up is a breeze and it is one of my favorite and most used Kitchen items.
